Module universityProject
Package studyMaterialsPackage

Class MarksDecorator

java.lang.Object
usersPackage.User
usersPackage.Student
studyMaterialsPackage.MarksDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<User>
public class MarksDecorator extends Student
The MarksDecorator class is a decorator for the Student class, adding additional behavior for viewing marks.

This class extends the functionality of a Student by allowing the student to have additional behavior when checking marks.

It is assumed that the behavior for viewing marks is added in the checkMarks method.
